name: Jump the Time Rope
description:
Use arrow keys to move and space to jump. Avoid the Main Clock's arrows and the Falling Clock's arrows. The 5 cubes above are your 5 lives. Touch one of the clock's arrows or fall outside the arena and one will disappear. If you have 0 lives, than it's GAME OVER. Their is a little crowd to encourage you while you play :) . Power ups also have the shape of a clock and will fall just like the Falling Clocks but fear not, their colours makes them special! There are 3 power-ups in this game: 

- The Speed power-up, (blue) makes you go faster but only lasts for 5 seconds;

- The Maximiser a.k.a. MAX power-up, (red) amplifies your size until you die or until you touch a Minimiser power-up;

- The Minimiser a.k.a. MIN power-up, (green) which minimises your size until you die or until you touch a Maximiser power-up.

If you lose, you will have to reload the page.

PS: I'm eleven and I started Unity two months ago :P
